title: Lalpa theh darh ang che
lyrics:
Lalpa, theh darh ang che,
Vana'n kan nghakhlel hle,
I malsawm ruah.
Tin, chin tinrengte hi,
Zingah leh tlaia mi;
Chawrin an pung dawn si,
Ram ro ata.

I khawngaihna ropui,
Kan velah hnim rimtui
A lo khah hian;
Hmelhriat loh kar hla mi,
An lo kal dawn a ni;
I khawngaih rimtui hi,
An hre bawk ang.

Nangma hmel mawi tak hian,
Leilunga thil tinreng
A hneh mai hi!
I hmelah thil duhawm
Tinreng chu a lang khawm,
A serte chu a lang khawm,
Ber zawk a ni.
